name: Bombard
oracle_text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Bone Splinters
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Vastly outnumbered, the Zendikari found creative ways to even the odds.

name: Call the Cavalry
oracle_text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
flavor_text: Benalish citizens born under the same constellations share a star-clan. Their loyalty to one another interlaces the Seven Houses.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Eager Construct
oracle_text: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.

name: Fan Bearer
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: Rest sometimes requires the right prompting.

name: Gruesome Fate
oracle_text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?"
—Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"For the lands you have lost and the beauty that remains, for freedom and the future, we must hold nothing back!"
—Gideon Jura

name: Inspiring Captain
oracle_text: When Inspiring Captain enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Our enemies will soon discover that we are not as meek as they had believed."

name: Jungle Delver
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Delver.
flavor_text: "There is no power too great to be used in the defense of our ancestral lands."

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: As patient and generous as life, as harsh and merciless as nature.

name: Manalith
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Though the afterlife, the city, and even the God-Pharaoh himself were one great deception, the ideals championed by the gods remain true."
—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

name: Mesa Unicorn
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: The unicorns of Sursi are a manifestation of Serra's joy and compassion. They frolic and dance like children, offering blessings to anyone they encounter.

name: Seek the Wilds
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "In my downtime I used to paint the vistas. Now the vistas disappear faster than my downtime."

name: Tattered Mummy
oracle_text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead who wander beyond the safety of the city crave only to spread their curse.

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "You are undeserving of the afterlife. You will never feel the God-Pharaoh's embrace."

name: Welder Automaton
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Welder Automaton deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Most of the constructs the renegades used against the Consulate weren't originally intended for combat. But some didn't require much modification.
